attributes.action: not go ahead with the proposal that Muslim men with more than one wife should receive extra benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the law in this country that bigamy is illegal and yet there is a government proposal to pay extra benefits to muslims males who have more than one wife. Surely this cannot be right; UK law supercedes the law of Islam (or does it?)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
